mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROD_CRAFWORK_RESOURCE_MES ( ID, PROD_NO, MID_PROD_NO, CRAFWORK_ID, RES_TYPE, FILE_NAME, RES_NAME, RES_PATH, RESOURCE, REMARK, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, COMPANY_ID, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_CRAFWORK_RESOURCE_MES.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PROD_CRAFWORK_RESOURCE_MES
PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MID_PROD_NO = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFWORK_ID = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RES_TYPE = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_NAME = #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_PATH = #{resPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE = #{resource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
